statements: DELETE FROM DemandResponsePrograms WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND energy_storage_capacity > 1000;
DELETE FROM Stored_Energy WHERE storage_location = 'Warehouse_A' AND energy_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM Stored_Energy WHERE energy_id = 100 AND storage_location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM ProgramParticipants WHERE participant_name = 'John Smith' AND energy_usage > 1000;
DELETE FROM program WHERE program_name = 'Energy Saving Program';
DELETE FROM energy_storage WHERE stored_energy > 1000 AND storage_location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM Events WHERE location = 'New York' AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
